bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhong e 中惡 , struck by the malign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xi jiao 犀角 quotes HTF : 中忤，中惡鬼氣，其證或暮夜登廁，或出郊外，驀然倒地， 厥冷握拳，口鼻出清血 , “The signs of being struck by the hostile , (i.e.) of being struck by malign demon qi, are such that if one has gone to the latrine during the night or has left the suburbs, one suddenly falls on the ground, with recession cold and clenched fists. Clear blood leaves from the nose and mouth”.
